job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: pJob DescriptionnbspOur work depends on a Site Reliability Engineer SRE joining our team to support the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services CMS activities in Columbia MD As an SRE supporting CMS the candidate will be trusted to work on the development analysis and use of monitoring tools and data visualization from multiple sources to proactively ensure the daytoday Enterprise Portal infrastructure health in the Amazon Web Services AWS cloud environment and on physical data centersppnbspppJob ResponsibilitiespulliSupporting Portal 247 operations and providing oncall support as neededliliTroubleshooting anomalies as part of Portal system reliabilityliliIntegrating new data sources to enhance the Portal infrastructure monitoring toolliliSupporting the development of new visual aids and enhancing existing visual aids to improve early detection of infrastructure anomaliesliliImproving the performance of existing and new monitoring toolsliliSupporting the troubleshooting activities to identify the root cause of infrastructure anomalies in a timely mannerliliEnsuring the systems high availabilityliliMaintaining required Service Level Agreements SLAliulpnbspppJob RequirementspulliBachelors degree in computer science information systems related field or equivalent experiencelili4 years of experience supporting a 24x7 Internetoriented production environment preferably across multiple data centers involving at least hundreds of serversliliProficiency in scripting with Python Perl or shellliliThorough understanding of fundamental internet protocols such as DNS HTTP and TCPliliProven experience in various websiteinfrastructure monitoring tools such as Chartbeat ExtraHop NewRelic Dynatrace and SplunkliliFamiliarity with common opensource infrastructure toolsliliExperience with common networking equipment Cisco Juniper F5 etcliliStrong understanding of networking protocolsliliExperience in fast paced Agile environments using ScrumKanbanliliExperience in DevOps and Continuous IntegrationContinuous Development CICDliulpnbspppPreferred QualificationspulliAWS experience using AWS FedRampliliAWS System Administration certificationsliliSAFe certificationsliliCMS or Health Care Industry experienceliliExperience utilizing ScrumKanban methodologiesliliExperience using JIRAliliProven oral and written skills to communicate with external and internal stakeholders effectivelyliul
